question: Who has become the first cricketer to reach 1000 runs, 100 wickets in T20Is?
explanation: Australian all-rounder Ellyse Perry has become the first cricketer of either gender to reach the rare milestone of scoring 1000 runs and taking 100 wickets in T20 international cricket. She achieved the feat run in the multi-format 2019 Ashes series where Australia beat England by 7 wickets in Hove.  Former Pakistani all-rounder Shahid Afridi (1416 runs and 98 wickets) currently stands closest to achieving the feat, while Bangladesh\'s Shakib al Hasan, with 1471 runs and 88 wickets, stands next in line to join Perry.
